title: FTX Settles Lawsuit for $33 Million Over Failed European Expansion
description:
Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX has settled a lawsuit to recover funds spent on its ill-fated European expansion. The settlement, totaling $33 million, ended a legal battle that stemmed from FTX’s acquisition of a European startup for $323 million. The lawsuit targeted the acquisition of Zurich-based Digital Assets DA AG, which FTX rebranded as FTX Europe […]
